description:
Bonjour
J'ai enfin fini mon image de la grande galaxie d'Andromède M31 que j'avais déjà traitée il y a 3 ans, mais sur laquelle j'ai plus que doublée les temps de poses. 
Comme d'habitude, tous vos commentaires sont les bienvenus ..:-)
Georges

L:80x300s de 2018 + 158x300s de 2020/2021 en bin1
Ha:20x180s de 2018 + 23x180s  de 2020 en bin2
R:19x180s de 2018 + 21x120s  de 2020 en bin2
V:19x180s de 2018 + 24x120s  de 2020 en bin2
B:10x180s de 2018 + 30x120s de 2020 en bin2

Total : ~ 27h de pose


Hi
I finally finished my image of the large Andromeda galaxy M31 that I had already processed 3 years ago, but on which I more than doubled the exposure times.
As usual, all your comments are welcome .. :-)
Georges

L: 80x300s of 2018 + 158x300s of 2020/2021 in bin1
Ha: 20x180s of 2018 + 23x180s of 2020 in bin2
R: 19x180s of 2018 + 21x120s of 2020 in bin2
V: 19x180s of 2018 + 24x120s of 2020 in bin2
B: 10x180s of 2018 + 30x120s of 2020 in bin2
Total time: ~ 27 hours
title: Messier 31 LHaRVB
